provisions.content: section 2 of this Act shall be as provided for in the University Teaching Hospitals (Reconstitution of Boards, etc.) Act. [Cap. U15.] 4. Vesting of rig hts, etc. (1) All the assets and liabilities held or incurred by or on behalf of the Specialist Hospital shall by virtue of this Act and without further assurance vest in the hospital re- named by this Act and shall be held by it for the purposes of the hospital. (2) All agreements, contracts, deeds and other instruments to which the Specialist Hospital was a party shall, so far as possible and subject to any necessary modifications, have effect as if the hospital renamed by this Act had been a party thereto in place of the Specialist Hospital. 5. Short title This Act may be cited as the Irrua Specialist Teaching Hospital Act. ______________________ IRRUA SPECIALIST TEACHING HOSPITAL ACT SUBSIDIARY LEGISLATION ____________________ No Subsidiary L egislation _____________________
